TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeySpline extends System.Windows.Freezable implements class System.IFormattable
Public Class KeySpline Inherits Freezable Implements IFormattable
public ref class KeySpline : System::Windows::Freezable, IFormattable
type KeySpline = class inherit Freezable interface IFormattable

summary.span: 样条关键帧使用此类定义动画进度。

span.span: This class is used by a spline key frame to define animation progress.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要了解如何的工作原理，最好先了解三次方贝塞尔曲线。To understand how a works, it is helpful to understand cubic Bezier curves. 一条三次方贝塞尔曲线由一个起点、一个终点和两个控制点定义。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, an end point, and two control points. 协调中的两个定义这两个控制点。The two coordinates in the defines those two control points. 贝塞尔曲线的起始点时描述关键样条，始终是 0 和终结点始终为 1，这就是原因定义仅两个控制点。When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points. 生成的曲线指定时间段; 期间内插动画的方式也就是说，曲线表示时间段中动画的目标属性的更改的速率。The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment. 若要更好地查看动画进度和贝塞尔曲线之间的关系，请参阅[密钥样条动画示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *cp1X**cp1X* 曲线的第一个控制点的组件。 component of the curve's first control point. 该值必须介于 0 和 1 之间。The value must be between 0 and 1. *cp1Y**cp1Y* 曲线的第一个控制点的组件。 component of the curve's first control point. 该值必须介于 0 和 1 之间。The value must be between 0 and 1. *cp2X**cp2X* 曲线的第二个控制点的组件。 component of the curve's second control point. 该值必须介于 0 和 1 之间。The value must be between 0 and 1. *cp2Y**cp2Y* 曲线的第二个控制点的组件。 component of the curve's second control point. 该值必须介于 0 和 1 之间。The value must be between 0 and 1. 值之间的分隔符可能是逗号或一个或多个空格。The separator between values may be either comma or one or more spaces. 如下所示的约定的以逗号分隔的一个点的组件和点之间的空间是推荐的约定。The convention shown here of commas between components of a point and space between points is a recommended convention. 请使用逗号作为小数点点组件的值内，即使这就是您的区域性的常规。Do not use a comma as the decimal point within the values of point components, even if that is the norm in your culture. XAML 值被视为 en-我们在所有类型转换情况下和逗号因此被解释为分隔符，而不是预期的小数点。XAML values are treated as en-us in all type conversion cases, and the comma is thus interpreted as the separator and not as the intended decimal point.

span.span: Key Spline Animation Sample

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为和为 (0，0) 和 (1，1) 分别，这不起作用的动画或关键帧的进度。The default values for and are (0,0) and (1,1) respectively, which has no effect on the progress of an animation or key frame.

span.span: The Bezier curve's first control point.

value.span: 该点的 和 值都必须介于 0 和 1 之间（包括 0 和 1）。

The default value is (0,0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要了解如何的工作原理，最好先了解三次方贝塞尔曲线。To understand how a works, it is helpful to understand cubic Bezier curves. 一条三次方贝塞尔曲线由一个起点、一个终点和两个控制点定义。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, an end point, and two control points. 协调中的两个定义这两个控制点。The two coordinates in the defines those two control points. 贝塞尔曲线的起始点时描述关键样条，始终是 0 和终结点始终为 1，这就是原因定义仅两个控制点。When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points. 生成的曲线指定时间段; 期间内插动画的方式也就是说，曲线表示时间段中动画的目标属性的更改的速率。The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment. 若要更好地查看动画进度和贝塞尔曲线之间的关系，请参阅[密钥样条动画示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要了解如何的工作原理，最好先了解三次方贝塞尔曲线。To understand how a works, it is helpful to understand cubic Bezier curves. 一条三次方贝塞尔曲线由一个起点、一个终点和两个控制点定义。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, an end point, and two control points. 协调中的两个定义这两个控制点。The two coordinates in the defines those two control points. 贝塞尔曲线的起始点时描述关键样条，始终是 0 和终结点始终为 1，这就是原因定义仅两个控制点。When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points. 生成的曲线指定时间段; 期间内插动画的方式也就是说，曲线表示时间段中动画的目标属性的更改的速率。The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment. 若要更好地查看动画进度和贝塞尔曲线之间的关系，请参阅[密钥样条动画示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要了解如何的工作原理，最好先了解三次方贝塞尔曲线。To understand how a works, it is helpful to understand cubic Bezier curves. 一条三次方贝塞尔曲线由一个起点、一个终点和两个控制点定义。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, an end point, and two control points. 协调中的两个定义这两个控制点。The two coordinates in the defines those two control points. 贝塞尔曲线的起始点时描述关键样条，始终是 0 和终结点始终为 1，这就是原因定义仅两个控制点。When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points. 生成的曲线指定时间段; 期间内插动画的方式也就是说，曲线表示时间段中动画的目标属性的更改的速率。The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment. 若要更好地查看动画进度和贝塞尔曲线之间的关系，请参阅[密钥样条动画示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011).
